word: Make your life preparation for eternity. You have not a moment to lose. Do you keep God's commandments? Do you fear to offend Him? Do you feel your dependence on Christ? Do you realize that you must be kept every moment by His power? Is your life filled each day with submission, contentment, and gratitude?--Letter 63, 1903, pp. 1-3. (To "Our Brethren at the Medical Missionary Council," April 19, 1903.)
